short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Let's keep tabs tidy with tree-style sidebar!!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"hey, why chrome can't organize tabs in sidebar in tree-style...?"
We've heard this line again and again.
And enough is enough.
New experience of tab has started just now from HERE.

[for Japanese]
chromeでもタブをツリーで整理する時代が来た！
